raw_body: WIJESURIYA – SOMA (12th September 1942 – 12th September 2023). Wife of late Nandasena Wijesuriya,​ beloved mother of Chaminda,​ Nalaka & Lasanthi,​ loving sister of late Sumanadasa Perera,​ late Chandrasiri Perera,​ late Nandasiri Perera,​ late Jayanthi Perera,​ Premasiri Perera,​ Kanthi Perera & Kumarasiri Perera,​ passed away on 12th September 2023. Cortege leaves the Funeral Parlour No. 591,​ Galle Road,​ Mount Lavinia on 14th September at 4 p.m. for Cremation at Mount Lavinia Cemetery.058220
